About the Debt Snowball Method
How It Works

The debt snowball method prioritizes paying off debts from smallest to largest balance, regardless of interest rate.

Benefits
  • Provides psychological motivation
  • Simplifies debt management
  • Creates momentum
  • Reduces number of debts quickly
Considerations
  • May not minimize total interest
  • Higher interest debts may take longer
  • Requires discipline
  • May not suit all situations
Important Note

This tool provides estimates. Consider your specific financial situation and consult professionals if needed.
